name: Wizardry Gaiden II: Curse of the Ancient Emperor
summary: Wizardry Side-Story II: Curse of the Ancient Emperor [Japanese: Uiza-dorii Gaiden II: Kodai Koutei no Noroi], published in 1992 by ASCII, was the second of the trilogy of Wizardry roleplaying games released for the original gray-scale Nintendo Gameboy portable video game system. .
